dt: {bc}a person who fails or chooses not to {d_link|vote|vote:1} or does not have the legal right to vote

dt.t: A mere 37 percent of the eligible electorate voted in the 1986 Congressional elections, the vast majority of {wi}nonvoters{/wi} arguably casting ballots of no confidence.

shortdef: a person who fails or chooses not to vote or does not have the legal right to vote
